messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I have lived and worked in East Herts for over 40 years. I am from a farming background but started my first business aged 22, and have run various businesses since, most successfully, but with one major failure. I have, fortunately, been able to rebuild from this setback. I am a lifelong ex-Conservative voter who no longer believes nor trusts the politicians. UKIP has sensible policies and confidence in the electorate and is the only party delivering a Referendum on Europe.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour an additional £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your pension when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP has sensible policies and confidence in the electorate and is the only party delivering a Referendum on Europe.
issues.health: UKIP will pour an additional £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

I am from a farming background but started my first business aged 22, and have run various businesses since, most successfully, but with one major failure. I have, fortunately, been able to rebuild from this setback.

images.caption: David Collins - UKIP candidate for Stevenage
